Class PopupModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw.stress_yourself.extend.ModuleClass
      • de.dhbw.stress_yourself.modules.PopupModule

  • public class PopupModule
extends ModuleClass
    This class generates a reaction test. The aim is to click on a button as fast as you can
    Author:
    Florian Albert
